resources.string:
There are no extraneous activities in the keyboard application, nothing is collected or stolen!
This is a standard system warning. For more details, see \“How to use the keyboard\” 

For a proper work, the application requires some permissions, WITHOUT ANY OF THEM, THE KEYBOARD WILL NOT WORK:

- access to read and write to Internal Sorage (for the work of custom dictionary, templates, external layouts, skins and other stuff used in the keyboard).

- window type \“On top of other windows\” (for the work of Autocomplete (word prediction), keystroke display and some dialog boxes).

For the work of Autocomplete (word predicition), keystroke display and some other windows (dialog boxes, keystroke display, etc), the program requires the window type permission \“On top of other windows\”.

In case you, for some reason, have been denied permissions, and their request no longer appears, then, permissions can be granted through the system settings of the Jbak2 keyboard application. The \"Permissions\" and \"On top of other windows\" items
Not all required permissions have been allowed

Каждый цвет, а также прозрачность, задаётся двузначным шестнадцатиричным числом из диапазона 00-ff.
Цвет задаётся в формате 0xaarrggbb или #aarrggbb, где
aa -прозрачность (альфа канал)
rr - красный
gg - зелёный
bb - синий

Например:
0xff000000 - чёрный непрозрачный,
0x00ff0000 - красный прозрачный,
0x77ffff00 - жёлтый полупрозрачный,
0xffffffff - белый непрозрачный и т.д.
Last running MWcosts it ended with an error.\n\nSend e-mail?
Не могу создать папку программы на карте памяти.\nЗавершаю работу.
Для отображения панели инструментов, должно быть выбрано кнопок не менее:
Для внешних файлов не работает.\nЗапускайте настройки из главного экрана.

Initial information 
(This text is available in the "Welcome" menu item) 

This program is designed for the automatic (or semi-automatic) calculation of lists entered as a regular text and in a certain format, taking into account both the main currency and many others you like. 

To start counting lists in other currencies, go to the currencies, edit (or add) the currency you want to count by ticking the "Main currency" line. Then indicate the exchange rates relative to the main one. 

After the currencies are set, to add an entry, click the "Add " button on the program launch screen and enter your list. 
About how to enter a list, you can read in the "Help" menu item (three dots). 

If you select in the same menu the "AutoСount" item, your list will be automatically calculated as long as a new data is entered. 

In addition to list counting, this program can be used as a notebook, and the entries can be arranged in different folders. 

And it can also be used as a text editor for large files. 
In the file view mode, it will change the text, but not save it. 

This program can also be used to view any files of any size, whether it be text, media, binary, etc.
Запрещает любые изменения в открытом внешнем файле. Не действует для текстов записей программы
и его открытие может занять продолжительное время или привести к зависанию программы или всего устройства.\nЧто делаем?

It is NECESSARY to save a new entry under a different name that does not match another one in this folder (different registers do not differ). Otherwise, it saves incorrectly! 

Rules for making a new entry:

- paragraphs are counted. 
- at least one character must be indicated before numbers in the paragraph, otherwise it will miscount! 
-if the paragraph ends with a number, then it is considered that this is the base currency. 
- if the paragraph ends with a number indicating the currency (for example, 50USD), then the specified currency will be added to the base amount in terms of the established exchange rate. 
- if you indicate the first character as #, then this entry will not be counted. 
- if the last character of the paragraph is #, then this paragraph will not be counted. 

NOTE!
Automatiс counting on long entries greatly slows down the work. 

To start the search, press Enter (or Loop) on the keyboard
